verbs.description: Several protestors with the Tennessee Poor People ’s Campaign [V: were] detained on Tuesday afternoon downtown near the Tennessee State Capitol prior to President Donald Trump ’s arrival .

[ARG1: Several protestors with the Tennessee Poor People ’s Campaign] were [V: detained] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday afternoon] [ARGM-LOC: downtown] [ARGM-LOC: near the Tennessee State Capitol] [ARGM-TMP: prior to President Donald Trump ’s arrival] .
